name: Square jump (zkucis)
description:
Relaxing game where the jump is automatic, but you control the platforms also your controls depend on the platform you land on.

For GMTK Jam 2020. Theme: Out of Control

How to play:

  • WASD / Arrow keys - controlling platforms
  • Space - pause

Made by: Zvonimir Kucis

Made with: Godot Engine
